name: SheRocksTheWorld
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: she rocks the world
Developer Terms of Use
des:
She Rocks The World inspires teenage girls to fearlessly use their own voices to live bigger lives. If girls can create a habit of stepping up and speaking up, that habit will soon become routine and when it becomes routine we WILL change the world. 

When girls share their fears, failures, successes, ideas and opinions with other girls through stories they create connections. It’s through those connections that we inspire other girls to share their own stories. We envision a global network of girl thought leaders, supporting each other, by fearlessly using their own voices to positively impact our world. 

Join us and fearlessly use your voice by submitting your story to info@SheRocksTheWorld.org 

Start your day with, "Alexa, open She Rocks The World"
